required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Quizartinib in Japanese Patients With Newly Diagnosed Acute Myeloid Leukemia (AML)
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 1b, Open-label, Dose Escalation Study of Quizartinib in Combination With Induction and Consolidation Chemotherapy in Japanese Patients With Newly Diagnosed Acute Myeloid Leukemia (AML)

brief_summary.textblock: This is a phase 1b, dose escalation, study of quizartinib to evaluate the safety profile, the pharmacokinetics, and the recommended dose of quizartinib for subsequent clinical studies of the combination of quizartinib and induction and consolidation chemotherapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects experiencing adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: day 0 to end follow-up, approximately 1 year

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax profile of quizartinib and its active metabolite
primary_outcome.time_frame: Induction cycle 1 day 8 to consolidation cycle 1 day 28
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the pharmacokinetics of quizartinib and its active metabolite, AC886

primary_outcome.measure: Tmax profile of quizartinib and its active metabolite
primary_outcome.time_frame: Induction cycle 1 day 8 to consolidation cycle 1 day 28
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the pharmacokinetics of quizartinib and its active metabolite, AC886

primary_outcome.measure: AUCtau profile of quizartinib and its active metabolite
primary_outcome.time_frame: Induction cycle 1 day 8 to consolidation cycle 1 day 28
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the pharmacokinetics of quizartinib and its active metabolite, AC886

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax,ss profile of quizartinib and its active metabolite
primary_outcome.time_frame: Induction cycle 1 day 8 to consolidation cycle 1 day 28
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the pharmacokinetics of quizartinib and its active metabolite, AC886

primary_outcome.measure: Ctrough profile of quizartinib and its active metabolite
primary_outcome.time_frame: Induction cycle 1 day 8 to consolidation cycle 1 day 28
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the pharmacokinetics of quizartinib and its active metabolite, AC886

primary_outcome.measure: Tmax,ss profile of quizartinib and its active metabolite
primary_outcome.time_frame: Induction cycle 1 day 8 to consolidation cycle 1 day 28
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the pharmacokinetics of quizartinib and its active metabolite, AC886

primary_outcome.measure: AUCtau,ss profile of quizartinib and its active metabolite
primary_outcome.time_frame: Induction cycle 1 day 8 to consolidation cycle 1 day 28
primary_outcome.description: Evaluate the pharmacokinetics of quizartinib and its active metabolite, AC886

arm_group.description: Quizartinib and Cytarabine to be used in both the Induction period and the Consolidation period. And either Idarubicin or Daunorubicin to be used in the Induction period.

intervention.description: [Induction period] Once-daily repeated oral administration day 8 to day 21. [Consolidation period] Once-daily repeated oral administration day 6 to day 19.

[Induction period] Once-daily intravenous injection of 100 mg/m2 cytarabine on day 1 to 7. [Consolidation period] Twice-daily intravenous injection of 3.0 g/m2 cytarabine at 12-hour intervals on day 1, 3, and 5.
Either Idarubicin or Daunorubicin will be used [Induction period] Once-daily intravenous injection of 12 mg/m2 idarubicin on day 1 to 3.
Either Idarubicin or Daunorubicin will be used [Induction period] Once-daily intravenous injection of 60mg/m2 daunorubicin on day 1 to 3.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- No prior treatment for AML (including quizartinib)
- ECOG (Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group) Performance Status of 0 to 2
Exclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of acute promyelocytic leukemia
- Active acute or chronic systemic fungal, bacterial, or viral infection not well controlled by antifungal, antibacterial or antiviral therapy.
